children.name: Get an overview of your Procure-to-Pay Process in Ariba

blocks.text: This Dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Procure-to-Pay process in Ariba. It highlights some key KPIs as well as a high-level analysis of the process to identify areas to investigate further.
Page 1: Discovery - A process model from your event log data, displays the most common process paths.
Page 3: Analysis - High-level analysis of key use cases
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

If you feel our Dashboards helped you during your analysis, please share some feedback regarding improvement ideas, wishes and problems. We always try to improve and extend the Dashboard Templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id")
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
	COUNT(DISTINCT "PO Id")
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: On-Time Delivery Rate
children.description: Definition: count of PO Items with "Delivery Completed" Flag and where the last "GR Creation Date" happened before the "Requested Delivers Date"

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	(1 - COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") 
        	> "PO Requested Delivery Date" 
            AND "PO Delivery Status" = 'Received') 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE "PO Delivery Status" = 'Received')) 
        * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT
	COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id" )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average Cycle Time
children.description: Definition: the time between 'Create PO Item' and 'Receive Invoice' is measured

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Receive Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item'))))      
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PO Item' 'Receive Invoice')

children.name: Late Payment Rate
children.description: Definition: Payments are considered late, when the invoice clearing happens after the invoice due date.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Due Date"
        	< "Last Invoice Payment Date")) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL)) 
    * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of overdue invoices
children.description: Definition: An Invoice is considered as overdue if it is not cleared yet and the due date is in the past

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id") FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NULL) 
        	AND "Last Invoice Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Definition: Percentage of cases with events like 'Update Price' or 'Change Payment Terms'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%' OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'))) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 10 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Conformance Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of PTP events

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
	^ 'Create PR Item'
    ~> 'Create PO Item'
    ~> 'Receive PO Item'
    ~> 'Receive Invoice'
    ~> 'Reconcile Invoice'
    ~> 'Approve Invoice'
    ~> 'Pay Invoice' $
        )) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Pay Invoice')) 
    * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Maverick Buying Rate
children.description: Definition: Whenever the PO Item is created after the Invoice is created, it is considered "Maverick Buying"

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Receive Invoice' ~> 'Create PO Item')) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Manual reconciled invoices rate
children.description: Percentage of invoices that have been reconciled manually due to submission method as paper invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(DISTINCT "Invoice ID") FILTER (
	WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status" = 'Reconciling' 
    AND "Last Invoice Submission Method"= 'PaperInvoice'
	)
/
COUNT(DISTINCT "Invoice ID") FILTER (
	WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status" = 'Reconciling'
	)     
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT
    CASE
		WHEN "PO Currency" = 'ZAR' THEN 'South African Rand'
    	WHEN "PO Currency" = 'AED' THEN 'United Arab Emirates Dirham'
    	WHEN "PO Currency" = 'HKD' THEN 'Hong Kong Dollar'
		WHEN "PO Currency" = 'RUB' THEN 'Russian Ruble'
    	WHEN "PO Currency" = 'DKK' THEN 'Danish Krone'
    	WHEN "PO Currency" = 'SEK' THEN 'Swedish Krona'
    	WHEN "PO Currency" = 'CHF' THEN 'Swiss Franc'
    	WHEN "PO Currency" = 'BRL' THEN 'Brazilian Real'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'GBP' THEN 'GB Pound Sterling'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'AUD' THEN 'Australian Dollar'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'JPY' THEN 'Japanese Yen'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'MZN' THEN 'Mozambican Metical'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'CAD' THEN 'Canadian Dollar'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'CLP' THEN 'Chilean Peso'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'EUR' THEN 'Euro'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'INR' THEN 'Indian Rupee'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'SGD' THEN 'Singapore Dollar'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'NGN' THEN 'Nigerian Naira'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'TWD' THEN 'Taiwan Dollar'
        WHEN "PO Currency" = 'USD' OR "PO Currency" = 'USS' THEN 'US Dollar'
        ELSE 'Unmapped Currenc(ies)'
    END AS "Currency",
	ROUND(SUM("PO Item Total Amount")) AS "PO Item Total Amount"
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "PO Currency" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Late Delivery Rate
children.description: Shows the rate of 'Received' Purchase Order Items for which "PO Requested Delivery Date" is after "Last GR Item Delivery Date"

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER (
	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Item Delivery Date") 
    	> "PO Requested Delivery Date"
		AND "PO Delivery Status" = 'Received')
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE "PO Delivery Status" = 'Received')
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average Cycle Time
children.description: Definition: the time between 'Create PO Item' and 'Create FI Invoice' is measured

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Receive Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item'))))
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PO Item'  'Receive Invoice')

children.name: Late Payment Rate
children.description: Definition: Payments are considered late, when the invoice clearing happens after the invoice due date.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date")
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL)
	)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with events like 'Update Price' or 'Change Payment Terms'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%' OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'))) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Conformance Level
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of events

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
    'Create PR item' ~>
    'Create PO Item' ~>
    'Receive PO item' ~>
    ('Receive Invoice' ~> 'Reconcile Invoice') ~>
    'Pay Invoice')) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Pay Invoice')) 
    * 100 AS "Conformance Rate"

FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "PO Creation Date", 

	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Due Date" 
        	< "Last Invoice Payment Date")) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NOT NULL)) 
        * 100 AS "Late Payment Rate"      
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "PO Creation Date", 

	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
    'Create PR item' ~>
    'Create PO Item' ~>
    'Receive PO item' ~>
    ('Receive Invoice' ~> 'Reconcile Invoice') ~>
    'Pay Invoice')) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID)
    * 100 AS "Conformance Rate"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Pay Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Receive Invoice')))) AS "Receive Invoice",
    
	COUNT(DISTINCT "Invoice ID") FILTER (
		WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status" = 'Reconciling'
    	AND "Last Invoice Submission Method"= 'PaperInvoice'
		)
	/
	COUNT(DISTINCT "Invoice ID") FILTER (
			WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status" = 'Reconciling'
		)     
	* 100 AS "Manual reconciled invoices Over Time"
                
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "PO Creation Date",
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%' OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'))) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Change Rate"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Late Delivery Rate
children.description: Shows the rate of 'Received' Purchase Order Items for which "PO Requested Delivery Date" is after "Last GR Item Delivery Date"

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER (
	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Item Delivery Date") 
    	> "PO Requested Delivery Date"
		AND "PO Delivery Status" = 'Received')
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE "PO Delivery Status" = 'Received')
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Supplier by Volume and Late Delivery Rate (Top 10)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
  COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "No. of PO Items",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
  	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") 
		> "PO Requested Delivery Date" 
        AND "PO Delivery Status" = 'Received') 
    / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE "PO Delivery Status" = 'Received') 
  		* 100 AS "Late Delivery Rate", 
	"PO Item Supplier Id"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Item Supplier Id" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "PO Creation Date",
    
    AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Receive Invoice')))
   	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "Average cycle time"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create PO Item' 'Receive Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Manual reconciled invoices
children.description: Percentage of invoices that have been reconciled manually due to submission method as paper invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(DISTINCT "Invoice ID") FILTER (
	WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status" = 'Reconciling' 
    AND "Last Invoice Submission Method"= 'PaperInvoice'
	)
/
COUNT(DISTINCT "Invoice ID") FILTER (
	WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status" = 'Reconciling'
	)     
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS
